title: File version resources
body:
Hi, we're recently picked up a package (LiveCharts) that includes binaries from SkiaSharp. We have some automation that verifies that all of the binary files we ship have valid file version resources, but these two binaries don't have it.

libHarfBuzzSharp.dll
libSkiaSharp.dll

Is it possible to have file version resources added for all binaries for serviceability purposes?
Thanks!
